From: Sabitha Menon <Sabitha.Menon@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-29 11:18
Subject: FW: Time to reflect - complete your SELF ASSESSMENT!
--------------------------------------------------
Dear team,

 

Hope all is well. This is a kind reminder to complete your self-assessment as part of our ongoing performance review process. The self-assessment is a vital step that allows you to reflect on your achievements, challenges, and growth opportunities.

 

If you are a manager leading teams, please encourage your team members to complete their self-assessment forms. The deadline for completing the self-assessment form is 15 Dec 2024.

 

If you have any questions or need guidance, feel free to reach out to me.

 

Best regards,

 

SABITHA MENONâ€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹

PEOPLE PARTNER

REAL FZE

DUBAI

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

I am sure we all agree that 2024 has been an eventful year ðŸ˜Š. As we approach the end of it, letâ€™s reflect on all youâ€™ve accomplished and share your insights through your year-end self-assessment. This is your opportunity to highlight your achievements, showcase your growth, and provide valuable input on your goals and contributions.

 

Why Your Self-Assessment Matters

*	Showcase Your Achievements: Your accomplishments deserve recognition, and this is the perfect platform to share them.
*	Shape Your Development: Help us understand your aspirations and align future opportunities with your goals.
*	Contribute to Team Success: Your feedback is essential in shaping our collective progress as a team.

 

What You Need to Do

*	Log in to Drive and complete your self-assessment. 
*	Access your Performance Form:

 



 

*	Fill in your 2024 Performance Form:

 



 

If you have any questions or need guidance, feel free to reach out to me or refer to the video here https://www.onechalhoub.com/sites/people-culture/video-content/52363/2023-ye-review-guide-for-employees <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fsites%2Fpeople-culture%2Fvideo-content%2F52363%2F2023-ye-review-guide-for-employees&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C94d2217613554cd00f7508dd10460473%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638684615135092777%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=oabqbIJEfIJ3ZVA4FfZTJ7VQjebOLXn9pa6K%2B1hJSVg%3D&reserved=0>

Good afternoon!

 

This is a gentle reminder to complete your self-assessment before the deadline of 15 Dec 2024.

 

Your self-assessment is a vital part of the performance review process, allowing you to:

 

*	Reflect on and showcase your achievements.
*	Share valuable insights on your growth and contributions.
*	Help shape future goals and opportunities.

 

If you havenâ€™t yet completed it, please log into Drive, follow the steps mentioned in my email below and submit your self-assessment as soon as possible.

 

If you need any assistance or have questions, feel free to reach out to me.

 

Thank you for your prompt attention to this important step.

 

Kind regards,

Sabitha

 

 

SABITHA MENONâ€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹

PEOPLE PARTNER

REAL FZE

DUBAI
